--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Firearm::
> 
> Firearm cursed himself under his breath. Why did he have to say 
that 
> last sentence? Why couldn't he keep his big mouth shut and at least 
> leave Spears some hope?
> 
> "Hey, don't think like that," he says. He was starting to really 
get 
> confused. The poor warrior had no idea how hard consoling a femm 
could 
> be, "We'll try to get him back. But we'll need your help."
>
